labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Instant invite link isnt hidden in the DM!
data.short_description: Streamer Mode Fails to Hide Invite link
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: DM Any person a Instant Invite Link- Step 2: Turn on Streamer Mode!- Step 3: Make sure that Hide Instant Invite Links are on!- Step 4: Goto that DM and your Instant Link wont hide.
